item.title: ElasticSearch Garbage Collection issues?
item.description: Seeing high garbage collection with ElasticSearch? My team was seeing periodic 300ms+ garbage collection pauses. We found out that we had misconfigured our ES instances. If you’re encountering this, make sure you’ve disabled memory swapping: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/5.0/setup-configuration-memory.html
